name: Rage Ball
description:
You are a rage comic character stuck in a 2D room where balls are falling from a pipe in the ceiling. You must avoid being hit by a ball and last as long as possible.

Controls : Arrow keys to move and Space to jump.

This is the second game I ever made (so it is a few years old). I was quite proud of it at the time but nothing was ever done with it. I am just glad people will be able to finally play it.
